prompt: <description>**Part 1: Construct a three-dimensional geometric shape with a flat base and a tapered top, resembling a hexagonal prism.** 1. Create a new coordinate system with no rotation and a translation vector of [0, 0, 0]. 2. Begin a new 2D sketch on the X-Y plane. 3. Draw a hexagon with the following lines: - Line 1: Starting point at [0, 0.3248], ending point at [0.1875, 0]. - Line 2: Starting point at [0.1875, 0], ending point at [0.5625, 0]. - Line 3: Starting point at [0.5625, 0], ending point at [0.75, 0.3248]. - Line 4: Starting point at [0.75, 0.3248], ending point at [0.5625, 0.6495]. - Line 5: Starting point at [0.5625, 0.6495], ending point at [0.1875, 0.6495]. - Line 6: Starting point at [0.1875, 0.6495], ending point at [0.0, 0.3248]. 4. Scale the 2D sketch by a factor of 0.75. 5. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into 3D using the following euler angles and translation vector: - Euler Angles: [0, 0, 0] - Translation Vector: [0, 0, 0] 6. Extrude the 2D sketch along the normal vector by 0.2537 units. **Part 2: Construct a cylindrical object with a flat top and bottom, and a slightly tapered middle section. The object has a central hole that runs through its length.** 1. Create a new coordinate system with no rotation and a translation vector of [0.0705, 0.0203, 0.2537]. 2. Begin a new 2D sketch on the X-Y plane. 3. Draw a circle with the following properties: - Center: [0.3045, 0.3045] - Radius: 0.3045 4. Scale the 2D sketch by a factor of 0.6089. 5. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into 3D using the following euler angles and translation vector: - Euler Angles: [0, 0, 0] - Translation Vector: [0, 0, 0.1269] 6. Extrude the 2D sketch along the normal vector by 0.1269 units. This will create a cylindrical shape with a slight taper. 7. Create a central hole by subtracting a cylindrical shape with the same dimensions but with a smaller radius. The radius of the hole should be approximately 0.1523 units.</description>
completion:
<json>
{"parts":{"part_1":{"coordinate_system":{"Euler Angles":[0.0,0.0,0.0],"Translation Vector":[0.0,0.0,0.0]},"sketch":{"face_1":{"loop_1":{"line_1":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.3248],"End Point":[0.1875,0.0]},"line_2":{"Start Point":[0.1875,0.0],"End Point":[0.5625,0.0]},"line_3":{"Start Point":[0.5625,0.0],"End Point":[0.75,0.3248]},"line_4":{"Start Point":[0.75,0.3248],"End Point":[0.5625,0.6495]},"line_5":{"Start Point":[0.5625,0.6495],"End Point":[0.1875,0.6495]},"line_6":{"Start Point":[0.1875,0.6495],"End Point":[0.0,0.3248]}}}},"extrusion":{"extrude_depth_towards_normal":0.2537,"extrude_depth_opposite_normal":0.0,"sketch_scale":0.75,"operation":"NewBodyFeatureOperation"}},"part_2":{"coordinate_system":{"Euler Angles":[0.0,0.0,0.0],"Translation Vector":[0.0705,0.0203,0.2537]},"sketch":{"face_1":{"loop_1":{"circle_1":{"Center":[0.3045,0.3045],"Radius":0.3045}}}},"extrusion":{"extrude_depth_towards_normal":0.1269,"extrude_depth_opposite_normal":0.0,"sketch_scale":0.6089,"operation":"JoinFeatureOperation"}}}}
</json>
